channel.title: Can't run any client
channel.description:
I can run any server with no problems. I have latest java, jdk and jre. Environment variables are:
CLASSPATH: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH% PATH: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin;%PATH%;ant\bin
And with every client I run any client it says "Error: Could not find or load main class client"

item.title: Can't run any client
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

ahh thanks, i will try that!

Read full topic

item.title: Can't run any client
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Most clients, still, are compiled in jdk 6, and you have jdk 7. So you have compile it yourself, or download jdk 6 and enable that in your system environmental variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't run any client

item.description:

I can run any server with no problems.
I have latest java, jdk and jre.
Environment variables are:

PATH: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin;%PATH%;ant\bin
